natural solution: Instead of doing each division separately and then adding, recall that  $x\div d + y\div d = (x+y)\div d $ if $d$ is nonzero.
Using this fact, we can compute as follows: \begin{align} 49{,}994\div 7 + 20{,}006\div 7 &= (49{,}994 + 20{,}006) \div 7\\ &= 70{,}000\div 7\\ &=\boxed{10{,}000}. \end{align}
